Package backend.models.users

Class Trader

java.lang.Object
backend.models.DatabaseItem
backend.models.users.User
backend.models.users.Trader
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
public class Trader
extends User
implements java.io.Serializable
represents a trader (user who can trade)
See Also:

  • Constructor Details

    • Trader

      public Trader​(java.lang.String name, java.lang.String password, java.lang.String city, int tradeLimit, int incompleteTradeLim, int minimumAmountNeededToBorrow)
      Constructs a trader with its own username and password.
      Parameters:
      name - the trader's username
      password - the trader's password
      tradeLimit - number of trades that can be done
      incompleteTradeLim - the limit for how many incomplete trades can be done
      minimumAmountNeededToBorrow - the minimum amount of items that must be lent before borrowing is allowed
      city - the city of the trader
